input:

Options:
(A) Working the printer is too complex for me
(B) Working the microprocessor is too complex for me

Options:
(A) Muslims love celebrating Christmas
(B) Muslims love celebrating Eid

Options:
(A) You're welcome my dear friend. Always glad to feed the elephants, that woefully endangered species
(B) You're welcome my dear friend. Always glad to feed the trolls, that woefully endangered species

Options:
(A) He doesn't want high risk investment? He should put it all on bitcoin!
(B) He doesn't want low risk investment? He should put it all on bitcoin!

Options:
(A) If it's on Britannica it must be True..
(B) If it's on reddit it must be True..
